text: The Men's 4 × 100 metre medley relay competition at the 2019 World Championships was held on 28 July 2019.ScheduleStart list The final was won by the British team in a European record time of three minutes, 28.10 seconds. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. ==Results== ===Heats=== The heats were held on 28 July at 10:50.Heats results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" |- !
